header_subtext: Simply browse through our extensive list of trusted doctors, schedule your appointment hassle-free.
please_login_chat: Please login to chat with doctors
select_doctor_to_chat: Select a doctor to start chatting
please_sign_up: Please sign up to book appointment
please_log_in: Please log in to book appointment
welcome_prescripto: Welcome to Medi_connect, your trusted partner in managing your healthcare needs conveniently and efficiently. At Medi_connect, we understand the challenges individuals face when it comes to scheduling doctor appointments and managing their health records.
prescripto_commitment: Medi_connect is committed to excellence in healthcare technology. We continuously strive to enhance our platform, integrating the latest advancements to improve user experience and deliver superior service. Whether you're booking your first appointment or managing ongoing care, Medi_connect is here to support you every step of the way.
vision_text: Our vision at Medi_connect is to create a seamless healthcare experience for every user. We aim to bridge the gap between patients and healthcare providers, making it easier for you to access the care you need, when you need it.
efficiency_text: Streamlined appointment scheduling that fits into your busy lifestyle.
convenience_text: Access to a network of trusted healthcare professionals in your area.
personalization_text: Tailored recommendations and reminders to help you stay on top of your health.
careers_text: Learn more about our teams and job openings.
find_by_speciality_desc: Simply browse through our extensive list of trusted doctors, schedule your appointment hassle-free.
top_doctors_desc: Simply browse through our extensive list of trusted doctors.
are_you_sure_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
are_you_sure_delete_conversation: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? All messages will be permanently deleted.
no_messages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
chat_init_failed: Failed to initialize chat. Please refresh the page.
connection_lost: Connection lost. Please refresh the page.
send_message_failed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
footer_description: Medi_connect: Bridging the gap between doctors and patients with seamless appointment management, secure prescriptions, and personalized healthcare solutions. Your health, our priority.
related_doctors_desc: Simply browse through our extensive list of trusted doctors.
privacy_intro_text: At Medi_connect, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our healthcare platform.
privacy_data_collection_text: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy_data_item1: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, date of birth, gender)
privacy_data_item2: Health information (appointment history, prescriptions, medical records)
privacy_data_item4: Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)
privacy_data_item5: Communication data (messages exchanged with healthcare providers)
privacy_data_use_text: We use the collected information for various purposes, including:
privacy_use_item1: To provide, maintain, and improve our healthcare services
privacy_use_item2: To process appointments and manage your healthcare records
privacy_use_item3: To communicate with you about your appointments, prescriptions, and healthcare needs
privacy_use_item4: To ensure platform security and prevent fraudulent activities
privacy_data_protection_text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy_data_sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only with: (1) Healthcare providers you choose to interact with, (2) Service providers who assist us in operating our platform, (3) Legal authorities when required by law, (4) With your explicit consent for any other purpose.
privacy_rights_item1: Access and review your personal information
privacy_rights_item3: Request deletion of your account and associated data
privacy_rights_item4: Opt-out of certain communications and data processing
privacy_cookies_text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our platform. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy_changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at help@mediconnect.com or through our contact page.
